channel.title: Hyperion/Eclipse
channel.description:
I've just completed a guide about running Hyperion on Eclipse. What I need to know is does Hyperion need the "xstream" and "xpp3" JARs to configure the build path like Arithon 474 does?
I just assumed anything that used Eclipse did. Was a bit stumped when I noticed they wasn't there. I don't want to release the tutorial with false content, so thought I would check.
Sorry to those two I PM'd, I just couldn't wait. :P

item.title: Hyperion/Eclipse
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Yeah I’ve come the conclusion that it doesn’t need them. :o

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion/Eclipse
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

in my hyperion folder i dont have those jar files and it runs and builds without error. so idk if that answers you question or not. hope it helps.

Read full topic
